title: Glacier National Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations         Sue Lake NPS/David Restivo  Panoramas Put yourself in the photo with these interactive panoramas.  Â      Super Squirrel Artist-in-Residence Myra Messick Simons  Super Powers Exhibit The subalpine ecosystem of Logan Pass is home to creatures with amazing abilities. They require special adaptations to survive at this elevation. It's almost like these animals have developed super powers. Let exhibits outside Logan Pass Visitor Center teach you about how these animals live and how climate change may be making it more and more difficult for them. Or check out our multimedia presentation of the exhibit.
